function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global movement of people leading to enhanced transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Widespread global spread of diseases, including Coronavirus, with potential for rapid transmission and increased cases","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and enhanced health screenings for travelers","Technologies":"Advanced health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, and surveillance systems","People":"Global population, travelers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government authorities, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Data sharing challenges in public health surveillance","Impact":"Limited ability to track, monitor, and respond to contagious diseases, leading to delayed and inadequate public health interventions","Mitigation":"Establish global data-sharing protocols, prioritize data privacy, and facilitate international collaboration in disease surveillance","Technologies":"Secure data sharing platforms, digital health records, and interoperable surveillance systems","People":"Health organizations, researchers, public health agencies","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, data privacy regulators"},{"Description":"Air transportation facilitating rapid spread of Coronavirus","Impact":"Increased risk of global transmission and introduction of the virus to new regions via air travel","Mitigation":"Strict travel restrictions, thorough health screenings at airports, and enforcement of quarantine protocols for infected individuals","Technologies":"Advanced health screening technologies, travel pattern analysis, contact tracing apps","People":"Air travelers, airport personnel, public health authorities","Owner":"Airline companies, airport authorities, government agencies"}]}
